thread.section_title: Keeper® Password Manager Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keeper® Password Manager | keepersecurity.com
thread.title: Raymond Hart
thread.title_full: Keeper® Password Manager reviewed by Raymond Hart

author: Raymond Hart
title: Raymond Hart
text:
Keeper is an awesome app that allows me to keep web-site, financial account, travel club account and other data stored securely. It can sync over multiple devices and platforms so that on my desktop, my tablet and my cell phone, all the account info I have is up to date.
The free version is good, but pay the license fee to get the multiple platform sync and multi-family useage.
